title: How algorithms can be used to solve problems

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains how algorithms that run on a computer can be used to solve problems?

choices.label: All problems can be solved with an algorithm that runs in a reasonable amount of time.
All problems can be solved with an algorithm, but some algorithms might need a heuristic to run in a reasonable amount of time.
All problems can be solved with an algorithm, but some algorithms might run in an unreasonable amount of time.
Some problems cannot be solved by an algorithm.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Investigate the situation, context, or task.
